Oil companies know that addressing climate change threatens their core business. Scientists have made it clear that if we want to have a planet that is still livable, oil production needs to drop 75% by 2050. #SaveThePlanet
https://t.co/YAjBvLSJDX
Join @UniteThePoor for the #MoralAssembly2022 to demand change, this Saturday in DC and virtually at 10am ET.

The Brazilian space agency’s Deter monitoring system shows that this past April had a 74% increase in Brazilian deforestation from April of 2021, rising to nearly 400 square miles – the largest stretch of land devastation in seven years.
https://t.co/shs17RiQ4T

#PolestarCars help bring us closer to the end of emissions. As an investor, it’s great to support such impactful innovations toward a clean planet. Looking forward to seeing Polestar 5 come to reality.
$GGPI $PSNY

The @BirdsongProject celebrates the joy & mysteries of birdsong, supporting @audubonsociety's mission to protect birds and the places they need. The Project’s #ForTheBirds Garden-wide birdhouse installation is now open at the @BrooklynBotanic

Learn more: https://t.co/Be8E8SZoeW
#Polestar3 will be one of the most climate-responsible cars ever made. Proud to be an investor in @PolestarCars and looking forward to their next sustainable innovation. #GGPI #PSNY
Thank you @POTUS and @VP for committing the U.S. to #ClimateAction. We all have a role to play and your plan of action can make critical advancements in the fight to #SaveThePlanet.

A major step toward #CleanEnergy, @POTUS @JoeBiden has invoked the Defense Production Act enabling @ENERGY to expand our solar power resources, lower energy costs, and create impactful job opportunities. https://t.co/HgC3QCbTBn

There is #OnlyOneEarth. Protecting it is everyone’s responsibility. We have the solutions, knowledge & technology to limit climate change & avoid ecological collapse but we need to act immediately as a collective. @UNEP #WorldEnvironmentDay

https://t.co/jVAlRm9Ups https://t.co/VcG0dReump

Today, people around the world are hosting virtual & physical events to celebrate the @UNEP’s #WorldEnvironmentDay. Find out what virtual gatherings, community clean ups & more are happening. Join the efforts to save our #OnlyOneEarth

#DontChooseExtinction’s Global Mindpool is a collective intelligence platform pooling the population’s perspectives on climate change, to better inform & equip policy makers. To have your voice heard and be part of building a sustainable future, visit https://t.co/Qdi5EhXaME

.@UNDP launched the #DontChooseExtinction campaign to spotlight how fossil fuel subsidies are contributing to climate change and growing inequalities around the world. Learn more on climate change and how to take action from @frankiethedino at https://t.co/M1o8ke9zK8

This Critically Endangered rocket frog’s place is in the resistance. The species’ official name was chosen by the people — Rana Cohete Resistencia de Intag (Intag’s Resistance Rocket Frog), representing the fight local communities in Ecuador have been waging to protect its home.

.@GlobalRewilding & @OpenForests released a map of dozens of rewilding projects in 70+ countries. This map will grow as members of the alliance add more projects, representing work around the world that aims to help nature heal.
@rewild @wildfoundation https://t.co/WBNSG8L2dd

The #WildForAll campaign – launched in conjunction with Our Great National Parks, a new docu-series on @netflix narrated by President @barackobama – encourages us to experience the wonders of nature and protect the wild. Learn more at https://t.co/l752Dg5dEd

Coral reefs are wonders of the ocean, yet one of the most threatened ecosystems on Earth. @IPCC_CH reported the majority of reefs won’t survive warming past 1.5°C @bbc details how scientists are defining more resilient coral in need of priority protection: https://t.co/HQkqWD1Onn

I am proud to join @EnergyVaultInc as a Strategic Advisor. Today Energy Vault took a significant step forward on its mission to accelerate decarbonization of our planet by helping China address climate change with clean, renewable energy.

The #WallisAnnenbergWildlifeCrossing is being built to provide habitat access to Southern California’s wildlife, especially its mountain lions. @Annenberg_FDN @NWF is leading this advancement in urban wildlife conservation. Read more from @cnn here: https://t.co/ISGDcGdn8e

Brazil is home to the Amazon and other ecosystems critical to climate change.
What happens there matters to us all and youth voting is key in driving change for a healthy planet. For more on voter registration in Brazil before May 4, visit https://t.co/0mKrfxLdRR #tiraotitulohoje

A near future with healthy cities that are powered by 100% renewable energy for all is possible. We must all come together in order to create it. We must all pitch in. We are stronger when we take action together. #LetsCreateTheFuture this Earth Day to help the planet. @100isNow https://t.co/tf1s2FwECJ

To celebrate the 52nd anniversary of #EarthDay, @EarthDay is hosting the Earth Day Climate Action Summit to share key solutions to reducing greenhouse gasses by 2030, in order to meet The Paris Agreement. #InvestInOurPlanet

Living more sustainably doesn't have to be difficult and #EarthDay is a great time to start. The @UN’s #ActNow campaign will help you to easily #InvestInOurPlanet. Learn more here: https://t.co/RBUDLIuFOi

A @UN @UNEP report concluded that the risk of devastating wildfires around the world will surge in coming decades as climate change intensifies a “global wildfire crisis.”

The @SharkRayFund announced a 2022 Our Ocean commitment to spend $25 million over the next five years to improve the health and biodiversity of the world’s oceans. I am thrilled to be able to continue to support this critical protection work. https://t.co/iKxAOMqrn3

@NetflixFilm and @UN hosted a conversation on #ClimateAction inspired by #DontLookUp. Some of the world's leading climate voices discuss the climate emergency, the need to #ActNow and what we can do. Full video: https://t.co/yEAdixuIGz

From @CFR_org: The Amazon plays a critical role in climate regulation. Often referred to as 'the lungs of the Earth,' it produces between 6 and 9% of the world’s total oxygen & long functioned as a carbon sink, absorbing more carbon dioxide than it emitted.https://t.co/UKpcWZO3eG

Oil & gas company ReconAfrica cleared forest in Kapinga Kamwalye Community Conservancy in Namibia without permission from the communal land board. The conservancy's chair talked with @rewild about how it has affected the community. #SaveTheOkavango

Wetlands, like mangroves, are disappearing 3x faster than forests. To #ActforWetlands & combat habitat loss, @BNTBahamas is leading efforts to restore mangroves ravaged by Hurricane Dorian in 2019. #WorldWetlandsDay

A new protected area in #Cuba shelters Critically Endangered Hawksbill Sea Turtles and migratory bird pathways. This latest conservation success brings Cuba to 28.5% protection of their marine continental shelf. (Photo: Gregory Piper) https://t.co/FIHiXSrqOX

Colombia has declared Isla Ají a marine protected area. The locally led movement to protect the area will safeguard 246 km² of the country’s Pacific coast, shelter threatened species, & sustain local communities' traditional livelihoods. @TheWCS @rewild (📷: Darren Lawrence) https://t.co/QSxrLXQkVr

Congrats to #Ecuador – today, President @LassoGuillermo expanded marine protections around the #Galapagos Islands. The @docgovtnz reports that 18 Kakī chicks hatched as part of their conservation breeding program between December 24 and December 28. This is an unusually high number and a boon for the world’s rarest wading bird. (📷 : Liz Brown/DOC) https://t.co/4z9p6UBPoT

“It’s funny and terrifying because it conveys a certain cold truth that climate scientists and others who understand the full depth of the climate emergency are living every day.” –Peter Kalmus, climate scientist #DontLookUp

The world lost a true hero for the planet when Dr. E.O. Wilson passed away - "the Darwin of the 20th century", prolific writer, pioneer of groundbreaking new concepts in biology, and one of the towering intellects of our time.
His teaching and writing inspires everyone dedicated to protecting our world. My heart goes out to his family.
His work helped show us how to protect the environment. My thoughts are with his loved ones.

Dr. Thomas Lovejoy passed away – the “Godfather of Biodiversity”, creator of the debt-for-nature swap concept, mentor and teacher of many, leader in linking biodiversity and climate change, and first to put Amazonia on the conservation map.
